description: Returns information about an ActiveMQ user.

parameters.name: BrokerId
parameters.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the broker.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the ActiveMQ user. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long.

nested_items.name: BrokerId
nested_items.description: Required. The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the broker.

nested_items.name: ConsoleAccess
nested_items.description: Enables access to the the ActiveMQ Web Console for the ActiveMQ user.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The list of groups (20 maximum) to which the ActiveMQ user belongs. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long.

nested_items.name: ConsoleAccess
nested_items.description: Enables access to the the ActiveMQ Web Console for the ActiveMQ user.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The list of groups (20 maximum) to which the ActiveMQ user belongs. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long.

nested_items.name: PendingChange
nested_items.description: Required. The type of change pending for the ActiveMQ user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: Required. The username of the ActiveMQ user. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long.

nested_items.name: ReplicationUser
nested_items.description: Describes whether the user is intended for data replication.
